entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the evening. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
